mapper.insert: insert into post (post_id, post_title, create_time, update_time, post_text, count_of_comments, count_of_likes, count_of_private, count_of_browsers, category_id, author_id, post_status) values (#{postId}, #{postTitle}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{postText}, #{countOfComments}, #{countOfLikes}, #{countOfPrivate}, #{countOfBrowsers}, #{categoryId}, #{authorId}, #{postIfVisible})
mapper.update: update post set post_status = #{status}, update_time = now() where post_id = #{id}
mapper.select: select post_id, post_title, create_time, update_time, post_text, count_of_comments, count_of_likes, count_of_private, count_of_browsers, category_id, author_id, post_status from post where post_id = #{id}
